text: Chaudhry Shujaat Hussain (; ; born 27 January 1940) is a senior Pakistani conservative politician and businessman. He was the 16th Prime Minister of Pakistan from 30 June 2004 until 28 August 2004. Hussain has been party president of the Pakistan Muslim League (Q) since 2003. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lahore Category:Prime ministers of Pakistan Category:Pakistani businesspeople
title: Shujaat Hussain
